meanings.definition: A neurotransmitter that is released at the ends of nerve fibers in the somatic and parasympathetic nervous systems and is involved in the transmission of nerve impulses.
meanings.sent1: Acetylcholine helps transmit messages between nerve cells.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study how acetylcholine works in the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The acetylcholine molecule threw a party for the nerve cells.
meanings.sent4: In the forest of nerves, acetylcholine is the messenger bird.
meanings.sent5: Imagine acetylcholine as a tiny courier delivering urgent messages in the body.
